pr_title: Replace broken JAR installer for ZIP distribution

timeline.message: Moved installer build.xml to release and changed for ZIP distribution
Removed INSPIRE packaging, removed JAR installer, added ZIP (and WAR) distribution

timeline.author: josegar74
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,61 +43,32 @@
     <os family="unix"/>
   </condition>
 
-  <property name="appName" value="geonetwork"/>
-  <property name="version" value="3.11.0"/>
+  <!-- Project build properties -->
+  <property name="appName" value="GeoNetwork"/>
+  <property name="displayName" value="GeoNetwork opensource"/>
+  <property name="homepage" value="https://geonetwork-opensource.org"/>
+  <property name="version" value="3.10.4"/>

replies.bodyText:
I don't know what the next release will be ;)
Either way, this value should get replaced by the .sh release scripts.
But please change (back) if needed.
replies.author: GeoSander

timeline.message: Removed link to Windows installer, replaced unused variable
